title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: Jarfile created using ajc outjar command does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file when there is a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file present.
OB: I call ajc with the options sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar and an output file is created with a .jar extension. However, the generated file is not a valid jar file because it does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file. The documentation for ajc's outjar command states that it should put the output classes in a zip file, but naming the parameter outjar is confusing because it implies that it creates a jar file instead.
